text: Raymond Gravel (November 4, 1952 – August 11, 2014) was an Canadian Catholic priest from the Canadian province of Quebec. He was formerly the Member of Parliament for the riding of Repentigny, as a member of the Bloc Québécois. He was elected to the House of Commons in a November 27, 2006 by-election following the death of Benoît Sauvageau. Gravel died of lung cancer in Lanaudière, Quebec. He was 61. ==References== ==Other websites== * Montreal Gazette: "Controversial priest wants Bloc Repentigny nomination" . The Gazette, October 25, 2006.
